channel.title: Crystal Key
channel.description:
So i recently made a crystal key chest i tested it by spawning a crystal key (989) and used it on the chest and it worked with no errors. I added crystal keys to drops and used my p ring and killed the npc i added it too for 30 minutes i then got sick of waiting so i made it so a random can drop it with no other drops so in npcdrops.tsm it looks like [code]#test 931:100 989:1[/code] If you can help me get crystal key to drop that'd be great.
[size=14pt][b]NOTE: I did compile and ::update run and closed and opened a new one[/b][/size]
